thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in the US
thread.title: Elearning Platform / Lms Exclusive License

title: Elearning Platform / Lms Exclusive License
text: Questions Business Summary Powerful online learning solution designed to equip individuals, groups and teams to develop their potential and progress in areas that matter most. Supports online training, classes, courses and any group activity that engages learners, resulting in improved performance. We are looking to perpetually license to one company in each industry. The platform has 75% basic LMS elearning functionality and is ready to be customized for your company. The three key pieces are Personalized Learning via iPath, Customized completely to the client needs, and Total Solution which includes training strategy, technology platform and custom content creation. Industries we are interested in licensing: Healthcare
